content: that had been unanimously approved by the world’s nations in December 2015 Really? Was this ratified by Congress at some point as all binding treaties must be? No? Then this is not approved by Nations, it was approved by a couple individuals who did not have the legal right to bind America or any other Nation to anything. The “deal” is bad, bad, bad for America, there is not a single thing in Obama’s private deal with Europe that is good for Americans.
